newsitem.title: LATVIA: TALINVEST BECOMES RIGA BOURSE MEMBER.
newsitem.headline: TALINVEST BECOMES RIGA BOURSE MEMBER.

text.p: Investment house Talinvest said on Friday that it has been admitted as a full member of the Riga stock exchange.
"Riga stock exchange board decided on Thursday morning to admit Talinvest as a full member," Talinvest Riga manager Rihard Svelpe told Reuters.
"We now have to resgister our two brokers and start working, which will happen in a few weeks," he added.
Talinvest recently said that it has formed a pan-Baltic investment bank, TSB Securities, which it developed after buying a majority stake in Lithuanian broker Suprema.
